content: Regional U.S. railroad Kansas City Southern  posted a better-than expected quarterly profit on Friday despite disruptions from Hurricane Harvey but may be impacted by the NAFTA negotiations as more than a quarter of its revenue comes from shipments between Mexico and the United States.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: Kansas City Southern overcomes hurricane to beat on revenue

content: Oct 20 Regional U.S. railroad Kansas City Southern posted a better-than expected quarterly profit on Friday despite disruptions from Hurricane Harvey but may be impacted by the NAFTA negotiations as more than a quarter of its revenue comes from shipments between Mexico and the United States.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: UPDATE 3-Kansas City Southern overcomes hurricane to beat on revenue

content: Oct 20 Kansas City Southern  the fourth-largest U.S. railroad  reported a higher quarterly net profit on Friday  driven by year-over-year growth from all of its six business units and increased rail car volumes.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: Railroad Kansas City Southern quarterly profit rises

content: CHICAGO Kansas City Southern  on Friday reported a lower quarterly net profit that missed Wall Street estimates by a wide margin as a historic drop in the Mexican peso after the election of President-elect Donald Trump affected the regional U.S. railroad's operations in Mexico.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: Mexican peso's slump hits Kansas City Southern profit

content: CHICAGO  Jan 20 Kansas City Southern on Friday reported a lower quarterly net profit that missed Wall Street estimates by a wide margin as a historic drop in the Mexican peso after the election of President-elect Donald Trump affected the regional U.S. railroad's operations in Mexico.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: UPDATE 3-Mexican peso's slump hits Kansas City Southern profit

content: CHICAGO  Jan 20 Regional U.S. railroad Kansas City Southern on Friday reported a lower quarterly net profit  which the company blamed on the weakness of the Mexican peso versus the U.S. dollar.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: Kansas City Southern profit falls on weak Mexican peso

title: BRIEF-Kansas City Southern  Watco Companies and WTC Industrial announce joint venture investment

content: NEW YORK  Nov 17 The head of U.S. railroad Kansas City Southern said on Thursday the company could transfer money from Mexico to the United States if President-elect Donald Trump lowers taxes for those transactions  even as the company works to convince Trump not to clamp down on trade with Mexico.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: KC Southern railroad could transfer funds to U.S. from Mexico

content: DETROIT Regional U.S. railroad Kansas City Southern  on Tuesday reported a worse-than-expected quarterly net profit  weighed by falling freight volumes and disruptions stemming from anti-government protests in Mexico.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: Lower revenue  Mexico problems hurt Kansas City Southern profit

content: CHICAGO  July 17 Regional U.S. railroad Kansas City Southern on Friday reported a lower quarterly net profit  hurt by falling coal shipments in particular as shipments declined almost across the board.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: UPDATE 1-Falling coal  grain shipments hurt Kansas City Southern profit

content: CHICAGO  July 17 Regional U.S. railroad Kansas City Southern on Friday reported a lower quarterly net profit  as revenue was hit primarily by falling coal and grain freight volumes.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: Kansas City Southern quarterly profit falls

content: NEW YORK  May 14 U.S. corporate spending on capital projects could fall this year to the lowest level since 2011  with steep reductions by the energy industry and companies in other sectors cutting spending amid broad concerns about global growth.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: UPDATE 1-U.S. capital spending seen falling to four-year low in 2015

content: CHICAGO  April 21 Regional U.S. railroad Kansas City Southern on Tuesday reported a drop in revenue as its coal and energy-related freight volumes took a hit and the strong U.S. dollar hurt its Mexico-based business  but net profit rose.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: UPDATE 1-Kansas City Southern reports decline in 1st-qtr revenue

name: Kansas City Southern
title: Kansas City Southern reports higher 1st-qtr profit

content: CHICAGO Regional railroad Kansas City Southern  reported a higher quarterly net profit that came in well above Wall Street expectations  driven mainly by higher freight volumes  and said it expected to benefit from a growing U.S. economy in 2015.
name: Kansas City Southern
title: Kansas City Southern profit rises  expects solid 2015 growth

name: Kansas City Southern
title: Kansas City Southern profit rises  beats expectations
